TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContentPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ContentPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ContentPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示某种类型的哪个属性是 XAML 内容属性。

span.span: Indicates which property of a type is the XAML content property.

summary.span: 处理特性化类型的 XAML 表示形式的 XAML 子元素时，XAML 处理器会使用此信息。

span.span: A XAML processor uses this information when processing XAML child elements of XAML representations of the attributed type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的关联属性的 类型不是 `string` 或，则 `object` XAML 处理器会尝试标识值转换方法。If the associated property of a is not of type `string` or `object`, a XAML processor attempts to identify a value conversion technique. 第一次检查是对 XAML 语言基元或特定 XAML 编写器实现启用的特定本机转换的本机类型转换。The first check is for native type conversion, either of the XAML language primitives or of specific native conversions enabled by that particular XAML writer implementation. 下一步是查找类型转换器。The next step is to look for a type converter. 在 .NET 实现中，类型转换器基于 适用的成员级别或类型级别定义进行标识。In the .NET implementations, a type converter is identified based on on either the member level or type level definition that applies. 如果无法标识值转换，XAML 对象编写器通常会引发异常。If no value conversion can be identified, a XAML object writer typically throws an exception. 为了接受多个对象元素作为内容，必须将 XAML 内容属性的类型作为集合类型来支持。In order to accept more than a single object element as content, the type of the XAML content property must be supportable as a collection type. 由于属性的 `Inherited=true` 声明，的值 通常也将内容属性指定应用于所有派生的类。Because of the `Inherited=true` declaration of the attribute, a value for a normally applies a content property designation to all derived classes as well. 通过应用空， 派生类可以 (删除内容属性特性的声明，并注意该类没有内容属性) 。Applying an empty enables a derived class to remove a declaration of a content property attribute by a base class (and to note that the class has no content property). 应用名称不同的会 将继承替换为 新的。Applying a differently named replaces the inherited with the new one. 在 .NET Framework 的以前版本中，此类存在于 WPF 特定的程序集 WindowsBase 中，并且在 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 中具有并行实现。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase, and also had a parallel implementation in Windows Communication Foundation (WCF). 从 .NET Framework 4.0 开始， 位于 system.exception 程序集中。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.0, is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml). ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 类的示例 Windows Presentation Foundation (使用的 WPF) ， 该类继承自。An example of a class in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) that uses the is , which the class inherits from. 属性是由设置的内容属性 。The property is the content property set by the . 如果 在 XAML 中实例化，则 将设置为在 "开始" 和 "结束" 按钮标记之间的元素。If a is instantiated in XAML, the of the will be set to the element that is between the start and end button tags. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为 `Film` 的类，它已 应用。The following example creates a class named `Film` that has a applied. 名为的属性 `Title` 指示为 content 属性。The property named `Title` is indicated as the content property. [!code-csharp[MarkupSnippets#MarkupContentPropertyAttribute](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#markupcontentpropertyattribute)] [!code-vb[MarkupSnippets#MarkupContentPropertyAttribute](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#markupcontentpropertyattribute)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于属性的 `Inherited=true` 声明，的值 通常也将内容属性指定应用于所有派生的类。Because of the `Inherited=true` declaration of the attribute, a value for a normally applies a content property designation to all derived classes as well. 如果使用此签名或应用空 ，则派生类可以通过基类 (来移除内容属性特性的声明，请注意，该类没有内容属性) 。Using this signature, or applying an empty , enables a derived class to remove a declaration of a content property attribute by a base class (and note that the class has no content property).

summary.span: 使用指定的名称初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 假设 CLR 支持，则提供的 `name` 应与 clr 类型系统中相关属性的匹配。Assuming CLR backing, the provided `name` should match the of the relevant property in the CLR type system.
